page.name: Network & Infrastructure
page.page_description: Welcome to the Network and Infrastructure status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.

incidents.name: [SBG][Network] - Backbone incident notification
incidents.message: Since 13:47 UTC, no more perturbation is observed. Start time : 03/12/2024 10:31 UTC End time : 04/12/2024 13:47 UTC Root cause : fiber cut No more intervention is needed from the provider. The configuration for the few isolated services have been reverted to its state prior the event and is operational. The incident is now fully resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

incidents.message: Start time : 03/12/2024 06:01 UTC End Time : 04/12/2024 00:32 UTC Service impact :We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
